monster.name: Awakened Tree
monster.languages: one language known by its creator

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monster.description: An awakened tree is an ordinary tree given sentience and mobility by the awaken spell or similar magic.Source: Monster Manual p. 317, Princes of the Apocalypse, Rise of Tiamat, Storm King's Thunder, Waterdeep: Dragon Heist, Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage, Ghosts of Saltmarsh, Mythic Odysseys of Theros, Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
